get.description: This API gets a GenericAction in your helpdesk

This API gets a list of generic actions in your helpdesk. If both actionAPINames and actionIds are provided, priority will be given to actionAPINames. If only one is present, it will be considered accordingly.

parameters.name: actionIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated array of ActionID. Maximum number of ids allowed is 50.

schema.description: Comma-separated array of ActionID. Maximum number of ids allowed is 50.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Comma-separated array of ActionID. Maximum number of ids allowed is 50.

parameters.name: actionAPINames
parameters.description: Comma-separated array of Action's API names. Maximum number of API names allowed is 50.

schema.description: Comma-separated array of Action's API names. Maximum number of API names allowed is 50.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Comma-separated array of Action's API names. Maximum number of API names allowed is 50.

post.description: This API executes an action with the given input values.

apiName.descrption: The API name for the given input parameter.

placeHolderContext.descrption: Supports placeholders for the input field with a suggestion button in the UI. The placeholder value is set specific based on the provided module name.

origin.descrption: Determines whether the input parameter is STATIC or DYNAMIC.

length.descrption: Indicates the maximum length of the input's value.

type.descrption: The datatype of the input parameter.

version.descrption: The version of the parameter. Only needed if the param is dynamic.

isEncrypted.descrption: The boolean value that determines to store the input as an encrypted value or not.

name.descrption: Display name of the input parameter.

uiType.descrption: The type for the input parameter to be rendered in UI.

targetTemplateName.descrption: This parameter is used for CustomActions.

id.descrption: Unique ID of the input parameter.

value.descrption: The actual value assigned to the input parameter.

isMandatory.descrption: The boolean value that indicates the input parameter is mandatory or not.

order.descrption: The order of the parameter in which it will be rendered in the UI.

moduleId.descrption: ID of the module to which the entities belong. It could be a system or custom module.

executionType.descrption: Specifies the type of action execution. The allowed values are SYNC and ASYNC.

data.message: Action Execution completed for Action ID - 1000009638757

executionType.description: Specifies the type of action execution. The allowed values are SYNC and ASYNC.

moduleId.description: ID of the module to which the entities belong. It could be a system or custom module.
